title: Amway launches dietary supplements for fairer sex
author: Shramana Ganguly
description: Amway Corporation announced a new range of products in women's health category under its flagship nutrition and wellness category Nutrilite.
cleaned_text: International [Women](/topic/women)'s day, [Amway](/topic/amway) Corporation, announced a new range of products in women's health category under its flagship nutrition and wellness category [Nutrilite](/topic/nutrilite). Addressing women's health concerns pertaining from anemia, [osteoporosis](/topic/osteoporosis), [insomnia](/topic/insomnia) to [menopause](/topic/menopause), the company launched the products enabling them to maintain a perfect balance between health, wellbeing and daily activities. Amit Rai, Area Manager, Gujarat, Amway India West said, "Over the past years, the lifestyle of Indian women has undergone substantial transformation.Indian women, in their effort to manage multiple tasks at work and at home, tend to overlook key aspects of their health and it is here that our new range steps in to address the nutritional gap and helps them to take charge of their health." The new range of products include those to enhance the nail quality, promote hair health and makes the skin look better, apart from strengthening immunity and relieving problems of hot flushes, night sweats and mood swings, allowing those in menopause to age gracefully.
